pkgmetadata.longdescription: A library for memory efficient parallelized Ensemble learningDocumentation available at: - http://mlens.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ - https://github.com/flennerhag/mlensContact=======For questions and comments reach out to sebastianflennerhag@hotmail.com.This project is hosted at https://github.com/flennerhag/mlens
